backend/main.mo: Actor implementing contact request submission, admin-restricted retrieval, and user profile storage with AccessControl authorization checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking a social-link URL update to the ContactSection component and associated packages.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: List of summarized frontend files describing styling, components, utilities, and updates across the React app.
frontend/.ic-assets.json: Asset configuration that ensures the .well-known directory is included in deployments.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color variables for light and dark modes and applying global background and text settings.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point configuring metadata, fonts, and loading the React application root.
frontend/public/.well-known/ic-domains: Domain configuration file listing allowed custom domains for the app.
frontend/public/robots.txt: SEO robots configuration allowing all major crawlers full access.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component composing the full landing page layout from header to footer.
frontend/src/components/AboutSection.tsx: About section with business description, trust indicators, and an image layout.
frontend/src/components/ContactForm.tsx: Standalone Formspree-powered contact form with required fields and styled inputs.
frontend/src/components/ContactSection.t: Contact section combining the contact form, contact details, and social links including the updated Instagram URL.
Features grid highlighting four service advantages with icons and a CTA linking to a YouTube video.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders the site footer with brand info, navigation links, legal links, and a credits bar with dynamic year and referral link.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Displays the main hero section with background image, headline, description, and buttons that trigger smooth scrolling.
frontend/src/components/LandingHeader.ts: Implements a responsive header with scroll-based styling, navigation buttons, and a mobile menu toggle.
frontend/src/components/ScheduleConsulta: Provides a booking section that loads and displays a Calendly embed after clicking the Book button.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Manages creation and caching of a backend actor tied to Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity authentication context, exposing login, logout, state management, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubmitContactReque: Empty placeholder file for a contact request submission hook.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for theme colors, typography, and layout behavior.
frontend/src/lib/scrollToSection.ts: Provides a helper to smoothly scroll to a section by ID with header offset handling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the main App component.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL params from query or hash and persist them in sessionStorage, plus utilities to clear stored or hash parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS config defining content paths, theming, colors, fonts, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Metadata describing the project state, existing features, and a pending request to update an Instagram link.
